cases.title: Unauthorized Root Access Detected
cases.description: System logs show successful root login from unknown IP address 203.0.113.45 at 03:42 UTC. No corresponding change ticket exists.
cases.context: Company policy requires immediate escalation for any unauthorized privileged access. This IP is not in our approved range.

cases.title: Potential Data Exfiltration Event
cases.description: Firewall detected 15GB outbound transfer to unknown cloud storage endpoint over 2-hour period from employee workstation.
cases.context: Data loss prevention system flagged the transfer. Endpoint contained customer PII based on pattern matching.

cases.title: Ransomware Signature Detected
cases.description: EDR system identified file encryption behavior matching known ransomware family on file server FS-PROD-08.
cases.context: Automated containment has isolated the affected host. 127 files were encrypted before detection.

cases.title: Repeated Failed Login Attempts
cases.description: User account shows 25 failed login attempts from 3 different IP addresses within 10 minutes.
cases.context: Account belongs to finance team member. IPs are geographically dispersed (US, EU, APAC).

cases.title: Unpatched Critical Vulnerability Detected
cases.description: Vulnerability scan identified CVE-2024-1234 (CVSS 8.9) on 3 production web servers. Exploit code is publicly available.
cases.context: Patch was released 14 days ago. Affected servers handle customer portal authentication.

cases.title: Expired SSL Certificate on Dev Server
cases.description: Certificate for dev-internal.example.com expired yesterday. Server is only accessible from internal development network.
cases.context: This is a non-production development environment with no external exposure or sensitive data.

cases.title: Routine Compliance Scan Completed
cases.description: Monthly PCI-DSS compliance scan completed successfully with 0 high or medium findings.
cases.context: All systems passed. Report will be filed with compliance team per standard process.

cases.title: Antivirus Definition Update Failed
cases.description: Single workstation failed to download latest antivirus signatures due to temporary network issue.
cases.context: Workstation is in isolated guest network. User reported issue; update completed successfully after network restoration.

cases.title: Suspicious PowerShell Execution
cases.description: PowerShell executed with encoded command parameter on HR workstation. Command attempted network connection to external IP.
cases.context: Behavior matches reconnaissance patterns. User claims no knowledge of execution.

cases.title: Database Access from New Location
cases.description: Production database accessed by admin account from IP in country where company has no operations.
cases.context: Access occurred outside business hours. Query patterns appear normal but location is anomalous.
